name: Pop Dice
description:
Pop Dice, It is a fun game to spend your free time to play. It will bring you unexpected happiness and surprises. Click and roll the dice to go forward, keep exploring, keep getting rewards.

How To Play?
- Click and start rolling the dice to go ahead
- Meet different rewards and collect them
- Easy to unlock and get new maps

The time has come! Now you just need to open Pop Dice and get happiness.
